explains: n. 药剂师；施与者；分配者；自动售货机
wordGroup: water dispenser 饮水机；开饮机；饮用机
tape dispenser 胶带座；胶纸座；胶带分割器
soap dispenser 肥皂分发器；给皂器

sentences.en: The dispenser quickly filled the prescription for me.
sentences.cn: 药剂师立刻照处方为我配了药。

sentences.en: This simple application provides a fortune cookie dispenser.
sentences.cn: 这个简单的程序提供了一个财富甜点分发。

sentences.en: Why not create a working beer dispenser with a computer chassis.
sentences.cn: 为什么做一个工作用电脑啤酒贩卖机。
